description:
Chapter 8 of Cataclismo is home to beefy boss Sirena. As if the Sirena being a formidable foe weren't enough, you're also challenged to defend locations outside of your base too.  Here’s how to beat the Sirena in Chapter 8.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Cataclismo: How to Beat The Sirena

description:
Deadpool & Wolverine reviewed by Tom Jorgensen. Opens in US theaters on Friday, July 26, 2024.

Deadpool & Wolverine is an outrageous, consistently funny superhero comedy that succeeds largely thanks to the contagious enthusiasm of leads Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman, and a surprisingly classy perspective on superhero movie history. Wade and Logan’s profanity-laced adventure forces the MCU farther out of its comfort zone than it’s been in years, even though old and increasingly frustrating issues like forgettable villains and a barely there plot show that breaking the fourth wall isn’t always enough to solve a movie’s foundational problems.
title: Deadpool and Wolverine Review

description:
In today's Fix of entertainment news:

Marvel may have let some leaks from Deadpool and Wolverine slip...intentionally. Because it was fake news designed to throw us all off their scent. And Top Gun 3 could be coming a lot sooner than Top Gun: Maverick did, at least according to current Hollywood's leading 'it' man, Glen Powell. 

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.
title: Marvel Let "Fake Leaks" for Deadpool and Wolverine Hit the Internet - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

description:
Watch the tense new trailer for Cuckoo for another look at this upcoming movie starring Hunter Schafer, Dan Stevens, and Jessica Henwick.

Reluctantly, 17-year-old Gretchen leaves her American home to live with her father, who has just moved into a resort in the German Alps with his new family. Arriving at their future residence, they are greeted by Mr. König, her father's boss, who takes an inexplicable interest in Gretchen's mute half-sister Alma. Something doesn't seem right in this tranquil vacation paradise. Gretchen is plagued by strange noises and bloody visions until she discovers a shocking secret that also concerns her own family. 

Cuckoo, written and directed by Tilman Singer, opens in US theaters on August 9, 2024.

#IGN
title: Cuckoo - Official Trailer #2 (2024) Hunter Schafer, Dan Stevens, Jessica Henwick

description:
Sir Ansbach is one of the first NPCs you’ll meet as you enter the Realm of Shadow, and his quest will span the entirety of the DLC. In this video, we’ll give you a step-by-step guide on how to acquire Sir Ansbachs entire armor set, weapon, and Ash of War. Just note that this video will not serve as a full walkthrough for Shadow of the Erdtree, only the major steps needed for Ansbach’s quest, so we’ll be skipping any unnecessary bosses and doing a few time jumps along the way.

00:00 Intro
00:31 Freyja at Three-Path Cross
00:46 Meet Ansbach at Main Gate Cross
01:06 Progress or Skip Through Belurat and Castle Ensis
01:30 Bypassing Castle Ensis and Rellana
02:19 Approach Shadow Keep to Break Miquella’s Rune
03:13 Revisit Freyja, Ansbach, Leda, and Hornsent
04:23 Fight Golden Hippo and Find the Specimen Storehouse
04:37 Make Note of Leda’s Summoning Sign To Kill Hornsent
05:09 Make Your Way Through the Specimen Storehouse
05:58 Find the Secret Rite Scroll
06:38 Find Freyja on Seventh Floo
title: Elden Ring DLC: Shadow of the Erdtree - How to Complete the Ansbach’s Quest

description:
The Spiritborn draw their immense strength from four Spirit Guardians. But what are these powerful beings and where did they come from? Join narrative designer Eleni Rivera-Colon for a deep dive into the four Spirit Guardians and the Spirit Realm in this latest video for Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred. Learn more about Jaguar (Rezoka the Hunter), Eagle (Kwatli the Seeker), Gorilla (Wumba the Guardian), and Centipede (Balazan the Devourer) from the upcoming expansion for the action RPG. 

Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred will be available on October 8, 2024.

#IGN
title: Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred - Official Spirit Guardians Overview Trailer

description:
IGN can exclusively reveal the first trailer for Infinity: Paradise Lost, an upcoming animated series adaptation of Corvus Belli’s sci-fi/espionage  RPG franchise.

Produced by Lex+Otis Studios and TeamTO, Infinity: Paradise Lost is directed and produced by Jay Oliva, the animator responsible for Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox, and Zack Snyder’s Twilight of the Gods.

Infinity, the game and this new animated series, finds mankind nearly 200 years into an alternate future where humanity has departed Earth and colonized multiple star systems. While there is a shared, albeit tense unity among these planetary factions, conflicts still exist as great nations attempt to maintain control of resources in order to further enhance their grip on power. Aliens are believed to have gone extinct in these star systems – until they begin to arrive. This is where Infinity begins.

The series’ voice cast includes actors Zehra Fazal (Young Justice, Halo Infinite,
title: Infinity: Paradise Lost - Exclusive Trailer (Zehra Fazal, Jason Spisak, Raffi Barsoumian)

description:
Check out the both fatalities and the fatal blow from Mortal Kombat 1's newest contender Takeda, as well as both the fatal blow and fatality for Ferra, the newest kameo fighter. 

Takeda completes the full season 1 Kombat Pack of DLC fighters for MK1, rounding out the list that also includes Omni-Man, Homelander, Quan Chi, Ermac, and Peacemaker. We grabbed this footage straight from the show floor of EVO 2024.
title: Mortal Kombat 1 - Takeda's Fatalities and Fatal Blow (4K)

description:
The Galactic War rages on and Super Earth needs you to take arms and dive back into the fight for liberty and managed democracy! Join members of the development team at Arrowhead Game Studios for a deep dive into Helldivers 2's Escalation of Freedom update, which brings the new 'Super-Helldive' CR10 difficulty, new enemies, new mission types, and more. The trailer gives us a peek at a new mission and more, as well as deadly new enemies, including the return of the Impaler enemies from the first Helldivers. 

The Escalation of Freedom update for Helldivers 2 arrives on August 6, 2024. Helldivers 2 is available now on PS5 and PC.

#Helldivers2 #Helldivers #Gaming
title: Helldivers 2 - Official Escalation of Freedom Announcement Trailer

description:
When you’re smiling, the whole world smiles with you. Check out the Joker: Folie A Deux trailer for a look at this upcoming film sequel to 2019's Joker. Joker: Folie À Deux stars Joaquin Phoenix as Arthur Fleck/Joker and Lady Gaga (Stefani Germanotta). The film also stars Brendan Gleeson (“The Banshees of Inisherin”) and Catherine Keener (“Get Out,” “Capote”), alongside Zazie Beetz, reprising her role from “Joker.”

Joker: Folie À Deux finds Arthur Fleck institutionalized at Arkham awaiting trial for his crimes as Joker. While struggling with his dual identity, Arthur not only stumbles upon true love, but also finds the music that's always been inside him.

Todd Phillips, who was nominated for Oscars for directing, writing and producing “Joker,” directed “Joker: Folie À Deux” from a screenplay by fellow Oscar nominee Scott Silver & Phillips, based on characters from DC. The film was produced by Phillips, Oscar nominee Emma Tillinger Koskoff and Joseph Garner. Lady Gaga served as music
title: Joker: Folie A Deux - Official Trailer (2024) Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga

description:
Can Deadpool & Wolverine director Shawn Levy save the MCU? During Deadpool and Wolverine's opening act, Deadpool cracks a joke about the MCU being at “a bit of a low point”, and later suggests that the ongoing Multiverse Saga has been “miss after miss.” If Deadpool & Wolverine proves to be a hit though, it may be the film that redeems the MCU in the eyes of fans and could potentially catapult the director, Shawn Levy, into bigger MCU projects. Don't miss this Shawn Levy interview to find out more!

#Deadpool #Marvel #Movies
title: Can Deadpool & Wolverine Director Shawn Levy Save the MCU?

description:

It's your first night shift as a zookeeper and you discover that some animals are mysteriously turning into mutants. Unravel the secrets of the zoo to save them and yourself. Zoochosis is available to wishlist now, and you can check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2458560/Zoochosis/

description:
Check out the Deviator release date trailer, announcing that the 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania game from Gami Studio will be released on August 2, 2024 in Steam Early Access (PC). We also get an exclusive look at some new Deviator gameplay. Get a peek at some exploration, platforming, and how combat works in this teaser.

Traverse mysterious cities and uncharted wilds, encounter a variety of strange creatures, and uncover the secrets in a chaotic world. Deviator centers around the mechanics of parrying and deflecting, so hold your nerve and use your skills to vanquish anything that stands in your way.

#Deviator #Gaming #IGN
title: Deviator - Exclusive Release Date Announcement & Gameplay Trailer
With enough ambition, even a plebeian could thrive in ancient Rome. Presented by Those About to Die

description:
On today's Fix of entertainment news:

Glenn Powell is on a roll. The standalone sequel to Twister is a certified hit, scoring well with critics and at the box office, with the third-biggest opening of the year. The movie touched down like a tornado, opening at number one in the U.S. box office, and is the second sequel of Powell's to hit number one—the first being 2022's Top Gun: Maverick. In other news, Marvel's Kevin Feige is adamant that the long-gestating Blade movie will be R-rated, but they don't want to rush it. But it has been five years since its announcement and they still don't have a script, so of course the fans are getting a little impatient.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN
title: Twisters Takes the Weekend Box Office By Storm - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
What’s the best fighting game of all time? (Evo 2024 Edition) #evo #fighting #sailormoon #gaming

description:
On today's Daily Fix:
Since the upcoming Deadpool & Wolverine movie is a team-up, it just makes sense for that Xbox Deadpool butt controller to get a partner, too. So of course Microsoft would tease a Wolverine-themed controller, complete with a curvy backside—unfortunately just like the Deadpool one you can't just buy this. You'll have to check Microsoft's Instagram account for details. In EVO 2024 news, Bandai Namco has announced the return of a popular Tekken character. And on the other side of fighting games, MultiVersus is also getting two new characters: Beetlejuice and Samurai Jack.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Xbox Reveals Wolverine Butt Controller - IGN Daily Fix
